properties.name: LAN Server Package
properties.description: Includes Morpheus for sleep voting and Login Shield

properties.name: Sound Filters
properties.description: Adds reverb and other sound features to minecraft. This mod is really nice and I would recommend it, but you can disable it if you don't like it.

properties.name: Blur
properties.description: Adds a blur effect behind inventories.

properties.name: Mob Dismemberment
properties.description: Have mobs fall into a bunch of body parts (includes blood effects)

properties.name: Better FPS
properties.description: Helps improve your FPS in the game, you can remove it if you don't need it or don't like the extra menu.

properties.name: Borderless Window
properties.description: Allows for easier alt-tabbing in borderless windowed mode.

properties.name: Relaxed Dynamic Surroundings
properties.description: Checking this will disable a lot of Dynamic Surroundings' features, including some sounds. (You can change this more to your liking in the mod options menu in-game).
